item.title: Extracting Odds from Sportsbook Feeds Using R
item.description: Finding Feeds There’s some sportsbooks’ that post the address to their odds feed on the website. Other times it’s an open secret. Either way, if you do a little digging you’re going to find bookmaker feeds. (We’re only interested in free feeds here, there’s plenty of services you can pay for.) What format Data is transfered over the net is many different forms. REST and JSON, (god forbid) SOAP, and XML are the formats you’re likley to come across.
